pages.text: Can be mined with an Iron Pickaxe.$(br2)Drops Stratified Stone when broken
Can be mined with an Stratified Pickaxe.$(br2)Drops Laminated Crystal when broken
Can be mined with an Laminated Pickaxe.$(br2)Drops Pocked Crystal when broken
Can be mined with an Pocked Pickaxe.$(br2)Drops Blazing Crystal when broken
Can be mined with an Blazing Pickaxe.$(br2)Drops Pearl Crystal when broken
Can be mined with an Pearl Pickaxe.$(br2)Drops Shifting Crystal when broken
Can be mined with an Shifting Pickaxe.$(br2)Drops Jagged Stone when broken
